4305430.name: Deathlust Demo
4305430.description:
KILL OR DIE

Cursed with the Deathlust, you must slaughter the Angels of the Overworld to stay alive. Ascend the Sacred Circles and try to end the Deathlust for all of demon-kind.

DESTROY THE ANGELS

The Angels of the Overworld specialize in many different types of Magic, from Poison Arrows, Deadly Incantations, and insta-kill spells. Destroy them all before they end your life and your chance at Freedom.

PARRY THE HEAVENFIRE

This bullet hell doesn't pull any punches. Expertly time your parries to send back your enemy attacks. Use their wrath against them, let it fuel your revenge. Parried attacks gain valuable Witchcraft meter.

FREESTYLE MOVEMENT

Use your different movement spells to traverse the epic heaven-scape of the Overworld. Show the angels that you are not to be trifled with. Griffins will send you flying once slain. Reality defying potions will propel you forward on your path for vengeance.

DEMONIC SOUNDTRACK

This OST features heavy-metal / drum and bass songs to keep your heart pumping. Shredding guitars, filthy drums, all at a demonic tempo. Harness the rage, and keep your killstreak writhing with pain.
4305430.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
